title: Mega Sound Bundle
description: 8 sound packs, 1500+ sounds at an affordable price.
longDescription:
This bundle package includes 8 different sound packs. Each pack has their own theme. There are more than 1500 sound file in this package.


Here contents of pack;

-Survival SoundsVol.1 ;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ba101b66aa89482c9fdd43b4a3fb24f2

-Survival Sounds Vol2;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/188d9a7ddccf46379c200baecfb068fd

-Scary Sounds Vol.1;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/d541343f9edc4a63add21f060eb589e6

-Scary Sounds Vol.2;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/e2a9a73d46a14b88abc3b618b19923ab

-Zombie Sounds;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/efd4500dbed54dcb9adefe08c4bf9415

-Sci-Fi Sounds;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/8a7847b8734445a3ae093a2ec85e1f51

-Medieval Sounds;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/22a2947ff4da4c41b7f115220663c728

-Weapon Sounds;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/a7050de9cf0b43b3add860187cb6f65b





Here is the SoundCloud previews for the packs:

-Zombie Survival Pack;

https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/zombie-survival-sound-fx-pack?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Survival Vol.1 Game Sounds Pack;

https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/survival-sound-fx-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Survival Vol.2 Game Sounds Pack; https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/survival-sound-pack-vol2?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Scary Vol.1 Game Sounds Pack; https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/scary-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Scary Vol.2 Game Sounds Pack;

https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/scary-game-sounds-vol2-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Weapons Sounds Pack;

https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/weapon-sound-fx-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Sci-Fi Sound Pack: https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/sci-fi-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


-Medieval Sounds Pack: https://soundcloud.com/tiny-bat-sounds/medieval-sound-pack-preview?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
technicalDetails:
Number of Total Audio Wave Files: 1500+

Number of Total Audio Cues: 1500+

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16-bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some

Supported Development Platforms;

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Note: In addition, users with unreal engine version lower than latest version are recommended to download files with version 4.20
